item.title: Luxbox Acquires Milagros Mumenthaler’s Toronto Platform Competition Title ‘The Currents’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Paris-based Luxbox Films has acquired the international sales rights to Milagros Mumenthaler’s “The Current” (“Las Corrientes”). The film, which has just been announced to world premiere in Toronto&#8

item.title: Toronto: Cillian Murphy’s ‘Steve’ to Open Platform Competition
item.description: Agnieszka Holland with ‘Franz,’ and her daughter and filmmaker Kasia Adamik with ‘Winter of the Crow,’ have their latest movies headed to TIFF for world premieres.

item.title: Toronto: Cillian Murphy’s ‘Steve’ to Open Platform Competition
item.description: Agnieszka Holland with ‘Franz,’ and her daughter and filmmaker Kasia Adamik with ‘Winter of the Crow,’ have their latest movies headed to TIFF for world premieres.

item.title: Toronto Festival Adds Bobby Farrelly, Brian Cox, Aziz Ansari and Guillermo del Toro Films
item.description: World bows have also been added for the latest movies starring Sydney Sweeney, Russell Crowe, Da’Vine Joy Randolph, Angelina Jolie, Seth Rogen, Keanu Reeves and Lily James.

item.title: Debbie Nightingale, Hot Docs Festival Co-Founder, Dies at 71
item.description: The veteran indie producer and Paul Jay launched a film showcase in 1993 that eventually became North America’s largest documentary festival.

item.title: Debbie Nightingale, Hot Docs Festival Co-Founder, Dies at 71

item.title: Agnieszka Holland’s Kafka Biopic ‘Franz’ Debuts Trailer Ahead of World Premiere at Toronto Film Festival (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Agnieszka Holland’s Franz Kafka biopic “Franz,” which will have its world premiere in Toronto Film Festival’s Special Presentation section, has debuted its trailer. In an exclusive interview with Vari
